lead_paragraph: Andy Bathgate, who earned the Hart Trophy as the National Hockey League's Most Valuable Player in 1959 with the New York Rangers and won the Stanley Cup in 1964 with the Toronto Maple Leafs, has died aged 83, ice hockey's Hall of Fame announced on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Ice Hockey-Stanley Cup Winner Bathgate Dead at 83
headline.main: Ice Hockey-Stanley Cup Winner Bathgate Dead at 83
